title: Blizzard's ‘World of Warcraft’ Head Says Online Game Isn’t Using Generative AI
description: Blizzard leverages AI for tedious tasks, enhancing game creativity, but asserts the technology is not used in its flagship MMO.

title: 6 Questions for Illuvium founder Kieran Warwick
description: Kieran Warwick, the founder of crypto GameFi project Illuvium, spoke to Cointelegraph about his life — includin his experience dabbling in ayahuasca years ago.
